Conversion among taxlist and taxmap objects

Source: R/taxlist2taxmap.R
taxlist2taxmap.Rd

Exchange of data between the packages taxlist and taxa.

This function should be used for the exchange of data between the packages taxlist-package and taxa.

taxlist2taxmap(taxlist, ...)

# S4 method for taxlist
taxlist2taxmap(taxlist, ...)

taxmap2taxlist(taxmap, relations, traits, synonyms, views, reindex = FALSE)

Arguments

taxlist

Input object of class taxlist.
...

Additional arguments passed among methods.
taxmap

Input object of class taxmap.
relations, traits, synonyms, views

Character values indicating the names of data frames in the taxmap object at data, which should be used for the slots taxonRelations, taxonTraits, taxonNames, and taxonViews, respectively.
reindex

Logical value indicating whether taxon IDs should be assigned anew or not.

Value

Depending on the applied function, either a taxlist or a Taxmap object.

Examples

## Subset Easplist
Cyperus <- subset(Easplist, grepl("Cyperus", TaxonName))

## Convert to taxmap 
Cyperus2 <- taxlist2taxmap(Cyperus)
Cyperus2
#> <Taxmap>
#>   61 taxa: 160. Courtoisina assimilis ... 54853. Cyperus
#>   61 edges: NA->160, 54853->192 ... 195->54255, NA->54853
#>   4 data sets:
#>     relations:
#>       # A data.frame: 61 x 7 (first 3 rows shown)
#>         taxon_id TaxonUsageID             TaxonName                   AuthorName
#>       1      160          160 Courtoisina assimilis              (Steud.) Maquet
#>       2      192          192   Cyperus auriculatus (Nees & Meyen ex Kunth) Kük.
#>       3      193          193    Cyperus corymbosus                       Rottb.
#>         ViewID   Level Parent
#>       1      1 species   <NA>
#>       2      1 species  54853
#>       3      1 species  54853
#>     traits:
#>       # A data.frame: 23 x 2 (first 3 rows shown)
#>          taxon_id       lf_behn_2018
#>       49      192 facultative_annual
#>       50      194    obligate_annual
#>       51      195      tussock_plant
#>     views:
#>       # A data.frame: 3 x 3
#>         ViewID                                 secundum view_bibtexkey
#>       1      1            African Plant Database (2012)  CJBGSANBI2012
#>       2      2 Taxonomic Name Resolution Service (2018)       TNRS2018
#>       3      3                    The Plant List (2013)        TPL2013
#>     synonyms:
#>       # A data.frame: 102 x 4 (first 3 rows shown)
#>           taxon_id TaxonUsageID           synonym synonym_authority
#>       180      160        50015 Cyperus assimilis            Steud.
#>       219      197        52000  Cyperus immensus       C.B. Clarke
#>       228      205        50017  Cyperus diffusus              Vahl
#>   0 functions:

## Convert it back to taxlist
Cyperus2 <- taxmap2taxlist(taxmap=Cyperus2, traits="traits", views="views",
    synonyms="synonyms")
Cyperus2
#> object size: 48.7 Kb 
#> validation of 'taxlist' object: TRUE 
#> 
#> number of taxon usage names: 163 
#> number of taxon concepts: 61 
#> trait entries: 23 
#> number of trait variables: 1 
#> taxon views: 3 
#> 
#> concepts with parents: 44 
#> concepts with children: 6 
#> 
#> hierarchical levels: variety < subspecies < species < genus 
#> number of concepts in level variety: 4
#> number of concepts in level subspecies: 2
#> number of concepts in level species: 54
#> number of concepts in level genus: 1
#>
